p.em: The County Administrative Board is a workplace with diverse operations. We are a knowledge based and supervisory organization with broad expertise in many different areas.

body.p: Our workforce includes lawyers, city planners, social workers, cultural environment curators, political scientists, behavioural scientists, engineers, veterinarians, scientists, agronomists, to name but a few.

Our daily work is to ensure the implementation of parliamentary and government decisions in the county, and to coordinate different interests as well as to the promote residents' needs for good development in terms of employment, service and the environment.
